Smart Hair Dryer: A hair dryer that connects to a mobile app and allows users to set the desired temperature and style from their phone.
Hair Dryer with built-in LED lights: A hair dryer that has LED lights built-in to provide additional light while styling hair.
Hair Dryer with detachable nozzle: A hair dryer that has a detachable nozzle that can be used to style hair in hard-to-reach areas such as bangs and around the face.
Hair Dryer with multiple speed settings: A hair dryer that has multiple speed settings to allow for precise control over the drying process.
Hair Dryer with heat protectant technology: A hair dryer that has heat protectant technology to prevent damage to hair while drying.
